info.title: WAHA - WhatsApp HTTP API
info.description:
WhatsApp HTTP API that you can run in a click!

Learn more:
  • Documentation
  • Supported features in engines
  • GitHub - WAHA Core
  • GitHub - WAHA Plus
  • WAHA Dashboard
  • WAHA Dashboard Documentation

Support the project and get WAHA Plus version!

  • WAHA Plus
  • Patreon
  • Boosty
  • Patron Portal

tags.name: üñºÔ∏è Screenshot
tags.description: Get screenshot of WhatsApp and show QR code

tags.name: üë§ Contacts
tags.description:
Contacts methods.
Use phone number (without +) or phone number and `@c.us` at the end as `contactId`.
'E.g: `12312312310` OR `12312312310@c.us`

tags.name: üè∑Ô∏è Labels
tags.description: Labels - available only for WhatsApp Business accounts

phoneNumber.description: Mobile phone number in international format

method.description: How would you like to receive the one time code for registration? |sms|voice. Leave empty for Web pairing.

enabled.description: Enable or disable the store for contacts, chats, and messages.

fullSync.description:
Enable full sync on session initialization (when scanning QR code).
Full sync will download all contacts, chats, and messages from the phone.
If disabled, only messages early than 90 days will be downloaded and some contacts may be missing.

url.description: You can use https://docs.webhook.site/ to test webhooks and see the payload

metadata.description: Metadata for the session. You'll get 'metadata' in all webhooks.

logout.description: Stop and logout from the session.

reply_to.description: The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

Bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket

Key.description: The key of the object in the S3 bucket

url.description: The URL for the media in the message if any

mimetype.description: mimetype for the media in the message if any

filename.description: The original filename in mediaUrl in the message if any

s3.description: S3 attributes for the media in the message if you are using S3 media storage

error.description: Error message if there's an error downloading the media

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp for when the message was created

from.description: ID for the Chat that this message was sent to, except if the message was sent by the current user

fromMe.description: Indicates if the message was sent by the current user

to.description:
* ID for who this message is for.
* If the message is sent by the current user, it will be the Chat to which the message is being sent.
* If the message is sent by another user, it will be the ID for the current user.

participant.description: For groups - participant who sent the message

hasMedia.description: Indicates if the message has media available for download

media.description: Media object for the message if any and downloaded

mediaUrl.description: Use `media.url` instead! The URL for the media in the message if any

ackName.description: ACK status name for the message

author.description: If the message was sent to a group, this field will contain the user that sent the message.

location.description: Location information contained in the message, if the message is type "location"

vCards.description: List of vCards contained in the message.

_data.description: Message in a raw format that we get from WhatsApp. May be changed anytime, use it with caution! It depends a lot on the underlying backend.

filename.description: Document file name. Value can be null

reply_to.description: The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

messageId.description: NOWEB engine only - it's important to mark ALL messages as seen

participant.description: NOWEB engine only - the ID of the user that sent the  message (undefined for individual chats)

reaction.description: Emoji to react with. Send an empty string to remove the reaction

reply_to.description: The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

fullName.description: The full name of the contact

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the contact

whatsappId.description: The whatsapp id of the contact. DO NOT add + or @c.us

vcard.example:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
FN:Jane Doe
ORG:Company Name;
TEL;type=CELL;type=VOICE;waid=911111111111:+91 11111 11111
END:VCARD

chatId.example: Chat id for the phone number. Undefined if the number does not exist

reply_to.description: The ID of the message to reply to - false_11111111111@c.us_AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

participant.description: Chat ID - participant or contact id

id.description: Chat ID - either group id or contact id

startTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the server started (milliseconds).

uptime.description: The uptime of the server in milliseconds.

force.description: By default, it gracefully stops the server, but you can force it to terminate immediately.

event.description: The event is triggered when the session status changes.
Incoming message.

text.description: Reaction to the message. Either the reaction (emoji) or empty string to remove the reaction

to.description:
* ID for who this message is for.

* If the message is sent by another user, it will be the ID for the current user.

event.description: The event is triggered when a user reacts or removes a reaction.
Fired on all message creations, including your own.
Receive events when server or recipient gets the message, read or played it.
The event is triggered when a user, whether it be you or any other participant, revokes a previously sent message.

The most recent presence information for a chat.
With this event, you receive new votes for the poll sent.
There may be cases when it fails to decrypt a vote from the user. Read more about how to handle such events in the documentations.
